name: gonic
desc: Music streaming server / subsonic server API implementation

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Gonic music server.

options.name: settings
options.desc: Configuration for Gonic, see  https://github.com/sentriz/gonic#configuration-options for supported values.
options.type: attribute set of (atom (null, bool, int, float or string) or a list of them for duplicate keys)
